title: Tsuihousareta Ojou-Sama No "monster Wo Taberu Hodo Tsuyoku Naru" Skill Wa, 1-Shoku De 1 Level Up Suru Zendaimimon No Saikyou Skill Deshita. 3-Nichi De Jinrui Saikyou Ni Narimashita Wa~!
alternative_title: 【パクパクですわ】追放されたお嬢様の『モンスターを食べるほど強くなる』スキルは、１食で１レベルアップする前代未聞の最強スキルでした。３日で人類最強になりましたわ～！ ; [Munching Away] The Exiled Young Lady's Skill of "Becoming Stronger by Eating Monsters" was an Unprecedented Strongest Skill Where she Levels Up with Every Meal. She Became the Strongest in Humanity in Three Days!
status: 【パクパクですわ】追放されたお嬢様の『モンスターを食べるほど強くなる』スキルは、１食で１レベルアップする前代未聞の最強スキルでした。３日で人類最強になりましたわ～！ ; [Munching Away] The Exiled Young Lady's Skill of "Becoming Stronger by Eating Monsters" was an Unprecedented Strongest Skill Where she Levels Up with Every Meal. She Became the Strongest in Humanity in Three Days!
description:
Description :
        Marquis' daughter, Charlotte, was blessed with a 「Gift」 known as 「Monster Eater」, which allows her to deliciously consume monsters. However, she was exiled from her real family because 'eating monsters is vulgar!' Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Gobbling Up Wild Caught Grand Boar!
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Gobbling Up Sauteed Mimic!
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Gobbling Up Slime Sherbet!
